other_title: Koi wa Ameagari no You ni (Japanese)
恋は雨上がりのように (Japanese)
plot: 17-year-old high school student Akira Tachibana is a girl who barely expresses herself. She harbors a secret crush on Masami Kondō, the 45-year-old manager of the family restaurant she works at part-time. (from manga)
opening_theme: "Nostalgic Rainfall" (ノスタルジックレインフォール) by CHiCO with HoneyWorks
